instruction: We want to set up a vacation alert on our emails from March to October. How can we do it?
output: You can set up a vacation alert on your emails using filters. To create a vacation alert, go to your email settings and click on filters. Then, click on “Create a new filter” and create a filter to select emails between the months of March and October. You can then specify a time frame or use a template to customize the alert. You can also specify a particular action like redirecting emails to an alternative inbox or setting an auto-reply to inform senders that you are away.
